sentences.en: A tremor had gone through his bowels.
sentences.cn: 他的肠子刮过了一阵战栗.

sentences.en: His bowels seemed to turn to water.
I am loose in the bowels.
I have a pain in my bowels.
Lyn went off into the dark bowels of the building.
sentences.cn: 林恩进入了这座漆黑的建筑物的内部。

sentences.en: Salts is a medicine that causes movements of the bowels.
sentences.cn: 泻盐是一种促使肠子运动的药物.

sentences.en: She must be purged and through this purgation her bowels shall spew.
sentences.cn: 她必须被净化,通过这净化,她的内容物将会喷出.

sentences.en: Some foods bind the bowels / are binding , ie cause constipation.
sentences.cn: 有些食物容易引起便秘.

sentences.en: Suddenly his heart seemed to turn to ice and his bowels to water.
sentences.cn: 他忽然心里一沉,吓得屁滚尿流.

sentences.en: Symptoms such as stomach pains and irritable bowels can be signs of bowel cancer.
sentences.cn: 胃痛和肠易激等症状都可能是肠癌的征兆。

sentences.en: The cabins are in the bowels of the ship.
The cabins were in the bowels of the ship.
The sorrow is so deep that It'seems to have cut the bowels to pieces.
Waste from the body passes out from the bowels.
sentences.cn: 体内的废物从肠道排出.

sentences.en: Why a few boys drank milk meeting loose bowels?
sentences.cn: 为什么有一些男孩子喝了牛奶会拉肚子?

words.tran_cn: 内脏（尤指人的肠）；同情心；勇气（bowel的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 肠，内脏，内部，肠( bowel的名词复数 )，内部，最深处
trans.tran_en: Your bowels are the tubes in your body through which digested food passes from your stomach to your anus

trans.tran_cn: 取出…的肠子（bowel的第三人称单数）
